R

r - Variable in class utilities.Color
 
radius - Variable in class geometries.Sphere
 
ray - Variable in class utilities.RayHit
 
Ray - Class in utilities
The Ray class is used to represent a ray that gets shot from the Camera object and into the scene to look for intersections with Shape objects or Light objects.
Ray(Vector3D, Vector3D) - Constructor for class utilities.Ray
The Ray constructor creates a new Ray object with the specified origin and the direction and also sets the t value to the T_MAX value because no intersection has happened yet.
RayHit - Class in utilities
The RayHit class is used to contain information about an intersection between a Ray object and a Shape object.
RayHit(Ray, Shape, Vector3D, double) - Constructor for class utilities.RayHit
The RayHit constructor is used to create a RayHit object with the specified parameters.
RayHit(Ray, Shape, Vector3D, Vector3D) - Constructor for class utilities.RayHit
The RayHit constructor with Vector3D intersection instead of a t value is also used to create a RayHit object with the specified parameters.
reflection - Variable in class geometries.Shape
 
remove(SceneObject) - Method in class renderer.Scene
The remove method needs a SceneObject as a parameter and removes it from the sceneObjects list.
render(Image) - Method in class renderer.Renderer
The render method which is the function that gets called from the controller.
renderer - package renderer
 
renderer - Variable in class main.Controller
 
Renderer - Class in renderer
The Renderer class which does all the heavy lifting.
Renderer(Camera, Scene) - Constructor for class renderer.Renderer
Give a Camera and Scene object to the constructor and set them as private fields for usage in the Renderer.
